trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection" /> class is an abstract class and cannot be instantiated.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection" /> 클래스는 추상 클래스이며 인스턴스화할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> or <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection" /> classes to connect to a directory server.
trans-unit.target: 디렉터리 서버에 연결하려면 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 또는 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection" /> 클래스를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.#ctor" /> constructor initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection" /> class.
The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates" /> property specifies one or more client certificates to send for authentication.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates" /> 속성은 인증을 위해 보낼 클라이언트 인증서를 하나 이상 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: One or more client certificates to send for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 인증을 위해 보낼 하나 이상의 클라이언트 인증서입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.Credential" /> property specifies alternate credentials for the connection object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.Credential" /> 속성은 연결 개체의 대체 자격 증명을 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Alternate credentials for the connection object.
If not specified, the default value is `null`.
The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.Directory" /> property specifies the domain or the server to which the connection should be made.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.Directory" /> 속성은 연결을 설정할 도메인이나 서버를 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The domain or the server to which the connection should be made.
For example, "http://fabrikam.com/platforms/adssoap.dll" represents a DSML server and "dc-01.fabrikam.com" represents an LDAP server.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 "http://fabrikam.com/platforms/adssoap.dll" DSML 서버와 "dc 01.fabrikam.com" 나타냅니다는 LDAP 서버를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> object that contains the request.
The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.SendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest)" /> method sends a single directory operation to the server.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.SendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest)" /> 메서드는 서버에 디렉터리 작업을 하나 보냅니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object that contains the server response to the request operation.
trans-unit.target: 요청 작업에 대한 서버 응답을 포함하는 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The returned response object may be different than the requested object if the server returns a different response.
trans-unit.target: 서버에서 다른 응답을 반환하는 경우 반환된 응답 개체가 요청된 개체와 다를 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.Timeout" /> property contains the length of time, in seconds, before the connection times out.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.Timeout" /> 속성에는 연결 시간 제한이 초과되기 전까지의 시간(초)이 포함되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The length of time, in seconds, before the connection times out.
Thirty seconds is the default time length property setting.
trans-unit.target: 30 초는 기본 시간 길이 속성을 설정 합니다.
